commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<?php
// Debug script to test endpoints
header('Content-Type: application/json');

// Test if we can connect to database
try {
    // CodeIgniter database connection test
    $CI =& get_instance();
    $CI->load->database();
    
    echo json_encode([
        'success' => true,
        'message' => 'Database connection successful',
        'base_url' => base_url(),
        'endpoints' => [
            'getStokBilgileri' => base_url('muhasebe/getStokBilgileri'),
            'stokBilgileriKaydet' => base_url('muhasebe/stokBilgileriKaydet'),
            'stokArama' => base_url('stok/stokArama')
        ]
    ]);
    
} catch (Exception $e) {
    echo json_encode([
        'success' => false,
        'message' => 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage()
    ]);
}
?>
